task.title: Directions for Apple Filling
task.shortdesc: Step-by-step guide for creating the apple filling.

taskbody.context: Do not create the apple filling without the pie crust made and ready to go.

step.cmd: In a medium bowl add the sliced apples.
Sprinkle with the sugar, flour, cinnamon, and salt and toss gently to combine well.
Place the small pieces of butter on top of apple mixture.
